website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a $150-$250 on-ear headphone, the well-built V-Moda XS should be on your short list.
pros: The V-Moda XS is a compact, comfortable on-ear headphone that has a sturdy design and folds up into a small carrying carry case (included)
It sounds slightly better than V-Moda's earlier on-ear headphone, the M80, and comes with a reinforced detachable cord that has an inline one-button remote and microphone

customer_reviews.title: Quality, nice sound, and very good noise isolation
customer_reviews.text: We got this headphones for our son as his Xmas present. Even though the headphones are on-ear, somehow V-Moda is able to turn this pair into a very nice isolation headphones. Too good... In fact, he now can't hear a thing from us even when the headphones are half volume. I tried it out and it's amazing to hear music with almost no external noise. Also, the bass is nice for someone'd like more bass in his/her music. I like a little more bass when watching movies on the phone... Also with the metal band, it seems that the headphones can withstand whatever teenager boys throwing at them. I consider getting myself a pair now after listing to his.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh T Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well built. Compact design with big sound.
customer_reviews.text: These on-ear headphones are surprisingly compact while being very sturdy and feel well made. They are much lower profile and sleek looking than other headphones and offer nearly the same sound quality as over-ear headphones without looking silly. The case they come in is quite small and they fit in perfectly and it feels like it will be protected very well since these would be very easy to transport and travel with even stuffed into bags without fear of damaging. Sound quality is superb and beats out more expensive headphones I've had before. Causes very mild ear discomfort after wearing all day.. but any headphone would do that. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryneheardt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these, but expect them to last about 2 years
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite headphones. I don't love ear buds (though I use them to work out) and having a small-ish head I need the XS sizing that they offer. The sound is excellent and this works well for me for music as well as my constant stream of work calls. Please know that while you can easily replace the cord with a new one, replacing the ear pads isn't as straight-forward and has resulted in me needing a new set every coupe of years.
customer_reviews.author: Melzie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this headphone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this headphone! The response seems to be flattened out overall, with less of the really high end and a much tighter bass. I've owned the V-MODA M80 for many years, and I absolutely love them; I still love them. However, it's undeniable that music coming through the XS headphones is more crisp, balanced and airy/very environmental, whereas the M80 is thicker with bass and low-mids. I feel that the M80 conveys the punch of a song, whereas the XS conveys the nuances. And if you want to crank up the bass, the XS delivers, without any mudiness
customer_reviews.author: Erik Moldovan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing build quality, just okay sound
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to really review headphones for someone else, they are SO subjective. The objective parts are amazing, though. The build quality is fantastic, these things can probably withstand nuclear winter. They were much more comfortable than I expected an on-ear set to be. I just couldn't enjoy the sound. Music was okay, if a little flat, but I just didn't love them like I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: 911jason

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish, solid build quality, adequate sound
customer_reviews.text: They're high quality, stylish headphones with a solid construction. They were a little uncomfortable, so I subtracted a star (if you're ears aren't usually sensitive to on-ear headphones then you're probably fine). The audio quality is great for the price (ie. it's pretty low, but better than any other cans in this price range). The cable they come with is fantastic. Rarely have I seen headphones with such solid, stylish construction come with cables of equal quality. The case they come with is also fantastic (and it looks cool!). You should order from V-MODA directly instead of from Amazon, because they'll let you customize more of the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Younkin

customer_reviews.title: THEY FALL OF MY HEAD!! Buy the V-moda Crossfade M-100 Master instead
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE RECONSIDER!! Headphones are good quality, but easily slip off of my head. I had other members of my family with various head dimensions try them on and they just slip off with any sudden movement. I cannot complain about the sound quality, but the ear pads feel like they’re between over the ear and on ear which is frustrating. Ended up purchasing the V-Moda Crossfade M-100 master. More expensive, but SOO happy with them. Highly recommend paying extra for the professional sound quality, comfort, and durability. MORE BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I like this brand
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son because he’s rough on headphones but one channel went out after only one month and there’s basically brand new. I am on the big brother to these outfits over the ear and I’m quite satisfied with those
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good on ears, but make sure you actually want on-ears. Compact!
customer_reviews.text: In short, these sound wonderful. Punchy bass without being overbearing, doesn't scoop the mids to much (I'm looking at you, M100s), sleek, pretty. You don't really see it in the picture but the cans themselves are actually very small. They might be too small for larger ears. I was coming from some over the ears and thought I wanted on-ears, but I just couldn't make the change. The noise isolation wasn't enough for me. They are very good for short periods at a desk or in a quiet room, but that's not how I was trying to use them. I wound up with the M100s instead and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are legit! Incredibly strong construction, high quality materials used for all components, and excellent sound profile make for the best pair of headphones I've ever owned. I have a rather large head and every pair of headphones I've purchased previously would snap either in the headband or hinges. These headphones are basically impervious to that. In addition, their unique small design makes for a better seal than any other on-ear headphones I've used. If you're looking for an especially durable high quality (but not ridiculously expensive studio type phones) pair of headphones, these are a great option!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Compact size, full sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I bought them for travel, and they're perfect. They fold up into a small, beautiful, and sturdy case. I also like that I can connect the cable to either ear. The sound is rich and full, far superior to the cheap headphones I had been using (because they would fold up so small). I wish they came with a black cable, instead of the orange, though I know I can buy one.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: I keep hearing from the internet that these don't put out the bass like the m100s
customer_reviews.text: One word wow! I keep hearing from the internet that these don't put out the bass like the m100s. After listening to these for a 3 weeks almost straight, I only take them off to sleep now, if the m100s push out more bass it'd be harmful to my ears! I use my tablet, NVidia Shield, and its killer without an amplifier. (Listening to the thumping of deadmau5 and kaskade while writing this)
customer_reviews.author: WAStanley734

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I would have went five stars on these but I don't feel as if I can find that sweet spot when it comes to having them on. Maybe my ears are to damn big or something...lol. But I will say this. For the money you can not go wrong with these. The sound quality is simply amazing !
customer_reviews.author: james arthur harrison

customer_reviews.title: small package, big beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.text: insanely clear, warm, beautiful sound. The fact that it folds is a plus, especially for tossing into my purse. The noise leakage is not so bad and inevitable with any on ear if the music is loud enough--so far, I haven't seen people glare at me on public transportation...but the sound... the sound is amazing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: I could not bring myself to return this XS - it sounds great, it's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was everything V-Moda's site said it would be. Bass lovers beware!!!! I really truly wish it had more bass or that the company will make a 40mm bass model - I'll trade up in a heartbeat. Despite my preference for bass, I could not bring myself to return this XS - it sounds great, it's comfortable, fits without 'the gap', is very strong and yet looks mildly delicate but classy. Good buy - I await the 40mm bass model...
customer_reviews.author: oa

customer_reviews.title: I can confidently say it is my favorite on-ear headphone
customer_reviews.text: After having the XS for a few months, I can confidently say it is my favorite on-ear headphone. Fit, sonic signature, and durability are best of class. I prefer the M-80's glossy parts, though. The XS is a bit Goth with the matte black upon matte black. I highly recommend this headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Analog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portables
customer_reviews.text: Godly portables. Slightly less bassy than the M80. Very enjoyable sound signature and pretty good detail at this price point. I prefer this to the Shure SE 846 (1000$ IEM). Somewhat Recessed highs if highs are your thing tho. Also excellent build quality and comfort
customer_reviews.author: Fimbulvetr

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset. I can hear things I never heard before and it's VERY well built. I've stepped on it at one point and yanked the release cable out. Still going! If you're looking for affordable Audiophile headset, you shan't look further. Note: Using Razer Surround audio, but the stereo is great too.
customer_reviews.author: William Scheef Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Headphones V-MODA
customer_reviews.text: Ok but not Great. Headband peeling like sunburn. Very crappy looking. Performance is good, replacement cord hard to find...overall ....OK.
customer_reviews.author: Sribeall

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is really nice, and they are definitely sturdy and well made, but they are not comfortable for long periods of time. I use them all day long and by the time I get to 2 hours my ears hurt and there is uncomfortable pressure on the top of my head. I just don't understand why they don't test out their prototypes for longer periods of time so when the product goes to market, they are actually comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M Olson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite on the go Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I heard that these headphones were quite good and as such I went ahead and ordered them. They were stated to be on the go audiophile headphones. As soon as I got them and tried them out using hip hop, regae, and some folk music. And boy did these headphones did an excellent job. Pros +very well balanced sound +Bass isn't overwhelming but +Clear and detailed sound My cons -not as comfortable as they should be. The cushions aren't as plush so it can hurt a bit -Maybe price but these are well worth the price tag
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Arreola

customer_reviews.title: I really do want to like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really do want to like these headphones. They have great sound quality, an awesome style, and I love how compact and protective the carrying case is. Unfortunately, they really make my ears hurt after wearing them for only about a half an hour. I bought these primarily for long flights, so I feel that I'm going to have to look for something more comfortable. I will keep them, as my daughter loves them and since she's got a smaller noggin she can wear them pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Konderla

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: As a DJ headphone, I love these headphones. At gigs they work great, really cuts the noise. I also use them at home. Has great base response and overall give a very nice balanced sound. Only issue is that they are on-ear, as the name says. So if you are looking to use these for hours and hours, then probably get the bigger brother V-Moda over-the-ear.
customer_reviews.author: Arijit Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: sound great, very fragile
customer_reviews.text: I had to send them back for a warranty repair after barely being used, and now the cable isn't working, only hearing out of one ear. They do sound good, but seem very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Wafinator

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable to wear and the sound is excellent. At first I had trouble getting the plug into my computer so that the sound was in both ears, but now works fine. I look forward to using them on the plane on my next trip in 1 1/2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Duvall Lily

customer_reviews.title: but after using these for a while noticed the base is sounding better. Still
customer_reviews.text: At first I wished I'd just ponied up another 50 bucks and bought the m 100, but after using these for a while noticed the base is sounding better. Still, if I had it to do all over again...
customer_reviews.author: I_buy_stuff

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf cans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the wife for when she is in dialysis. Nearly indestructible good carry case, V-MODA sound quality. Smaller footprint is the perfect size for her.
customer_reviews.author: TonyG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of M-80's and these sound just about the same. For me the difference is in comfort and portability. These just fit on my head better and there is less pressure.
customer_reviews.author: hollanbm

customer_reviews.title: Quality in a compact on ear
customer_reviews.text: sounds excellent very well built and almost as good sounding as my crossfade m100 headphones minor difference in sound. Also very comfortable would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tuleman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! Turn them up and tune them out! Love them for gaming and great music definition!
customer_reviews.author: Cherylx6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EXCELENT PRODUCT... it has a great sound quality and is almost like unbreakeable. great piece... worth buying
customer_reviews.author: CarlosGuedes

customer_reviews.title: V-Moda XS is something truly remarkable !!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of V-Moda's and boy was I blown away by these. I purchased these as new from a reputed seller and they were virtually unused. Everything from V-Moda's packaging to presentation to product is all top class. The chord itself looks indestructible and the headphones too feel solid. The ear-pads are super comfy and can be worn for long periods of time. I own the Bose Soundtrue on ear headphones and I must say they pale in comparison to the V-Moda XS. Well worth the cost and the sound is plain "heavenly". Noise cancellation is almost perfect. My only concern is that for people with larger craniums, it could be a small fit
customer_reviews.author: Caracio Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Natural accurate sound and amazing comfort. I have never had headphones that were this easy to wear and I've had quite a few. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Camino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones. I have the m-80s which
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. I have the m-80s which, in my opinion, these do not add anything to. However these headphones are a slimmer profile.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: As previous reviewers noted, the bass is more subtle ...
customer_reviews.text: As previous reviewers noted, the bass is more subtle, but the clarity of the sound makes up for the more subtle bass.
customer_reviews.author: MKH

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and portability
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and portability, but they do pinch the head a little bit. At least for me I can't usually wear them for more than an hour. Other then that, great build quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: V moda does it again
customer_reviews.text: Once again Some of the best sounding and comfortable headphone I have ever worn .I have never been disappointed by buying a Vmoda product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headphones
customer_reviews.text: My second pair after I lost my first, there's a reason why I decided to buy v-moda again. It's superior.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound. I can hear notes that I missed all the time. Fit is ok and look is not bad. Only thing that bothers me is the cable, that tangles all the time. Other than that, amazing sound and clear notes.
customer_reviews.author: Yisus

customer_reviews.title: i love them!
customer_reviews.text: V-moda my no.1 brand for music headsets, i love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nehudan

customer_reviews.title: For the money cant be beat.
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding ear phone better than some high end models
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Horton

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my BOSE headphones...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my BOSE. Actually better than i expected. Fit is a little off, but could be my head shape which is long.
customer_reviews.author: R. Vallee

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for almost a month now. There are many things i can compliment on, for example how comfortable it is and most importantly the sound quality. I am by no means an expert on sound quality but i like what i hear using these headphones. It has deep bass. Mids have clarity and high frequencies have vividness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think black is a better colour Sound is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I think black is a better colour Sound is excellent! It has a solid built! I would recommend this to people who listen to a wide genre of music
customer_reviews.author: pragun

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is awesome, fits my huge head perfectly and feels so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delightful product easy to use and great sound. Compact, well built, and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. I especially like the design details
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. I especially like the design details; choise of materials, portable and foldable so it takes little space, the cord is nice looking and can be unplugged or used on any side, an other person can plug in and listen to yor music... lots of fine finesses.
customer_reviews.author: Line Moe

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great.
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy on bass but very balanced with the highs and mids to make every sound crystal clear. These headphones are great.
customer_reviews.author: Z Smith

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 2 weeks...bummer!
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like these headphones. I have a set of m100s that have been problem free. I went with V-Moda xs for travel size and durable design. I have had them 2 weeks and the adjustment mechanism for ear pieces has failed. I am disappointed as they are fairly comfortable for short periods and sound good. The last thing I expected was mechanical failure with these after all the hype about military grade materials and attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them and all her coworkers are envious
customer_reviews.author: Paul Watson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great on-ear phones. Very portable and not at all bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon frequently bought together is downright incorrect, and these headphones give me a headache.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THE EAR PADS FOR THIS. They are not compatible, even though Amazon lists them in the frequently bought together bit of the page. The sound quality is fine, but they're uncomfortable and I bought them thinking I could replace the ear pads, and that that would make them more comfortable due to this problem after reading reviews on those ear pads. Since they were linked from the Amazon page, I assumed they were compatible. I'm probably going to buy the over the ear version sooner or later due to this, as even with this on my ears for a few minutes I'm already starting to get a headache. Thanks for being misleading Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Glen Minard

customer_reviews.title: Best portable set I've used yet!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones in sound quality, build, style, and portability, but don't expect any isolation
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great all around for portable headphones
customer_reviews.text: Clear sound, comfortable, light, all the features I want in headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Fleishhacker

customer_reviews.title: A real great product!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy listening real HiFi edges of sound and with the V-MODA we don't disturb quiet environments. A real great product!
customer_reviews.author: Patrik Lori

customer_reviews.title: Sound good, but hurt ears after a while.
customer_reviews.text: In a side by side comparison to a bunch of other headphones in this price range, I chose these because I preferred the sound profile. These sound good with a cell phone - but strangely, sound bad plugged into a computer. They are portable. After about an hour and a half, they become extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!! Just got them in the mail today!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, they sound incredible! So compact yet powerful as hell. Smooth, crisp and clear. Bass comes through very nicely, vocals are incredible, I can each and every instrument so clearly. On top of all that, the seller delivered them to me in exactly three days!!!! The case is a hard shell that will definitely keep them safe as i travel with them!!! Did I say how happy I am with my new headphones...lol? The fit is just right, not snug on the ears and the headband has no gaps! I've listened to Kirk Franklin, Heather Headly, Kem, Katy Perry, Kirk Whalum, Norah Jones, Boney James, Journey, and more! Every dang body sounds WONDERFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Coloring Gram

customer_reviews.title: excuse my english is not very good I hope understand me amazing headphones one of my ...
customer_reviews.text: excuse my english is not very good I hope understand me amazing headphones one of my favorite brands with Sennheiser and byerdynamic I had previously the crossfade lp2 magnificent headphones amazing build quality the reason for the 4 stars is because after one month and a half of using the ear pads of the right side was exploded for no apparent reason still are amazing headphones have already sent order replacements I live in Mexico and is more expensive for me to send my headphones to buy the ear cushions for myself
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, build quality seems ok - but padding coming apart already.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, feel well built. But after 5 months the padding on the ear cup is already coming apart. That is incredibly disappointing. *edit* You can buy replacement earpads. So it's not the end of the world. The sound is still amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These would be perfect if the ear cups rotated, but since the whole design is so precise, they wouldn't really line up with my weird head and ears exactly right. I wanted to love them because they sound great and when they fold up they are TINY.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Filipkowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Goos clear sound and so compact and light. Nice stylish appearance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular headphones! Sound great, mic works awesome, practically indestructible. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SethBLaw

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but hurts when you wear them for more than an hour.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing. That said, the headphones hurt my ears / head if I wore them for more than an hour at a stretch. And, one of the ear piece extenders did not extend smoothly like the other side. I wound up returning the headphones due to the pain in wearing for more than an hour. Otherwise, I would have loved to have kept them because of the amazing sound they produced.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin D. Croft

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: As described. Great quality and a perfect fit. Love love them :))
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: It works well. If you wear it for long ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well. If you wear it for long hours with glasses, side of head near the headphone ears will start to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: fallenangelessence

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cans (headphones). Adding to my extensive high end collection.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, not very functional.
customer_reviews.text: Audio is decent, ear-phones have no real retention (even just doing simple things like laying down)
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than they seem in the pic.
customer_reviews.text: Work great but smaller than expected. Had to return because they couldn't fit with thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: awesome sound and build quality, the overal look and comfort is amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: gregorio

customer_reviews.title: As advertised: durable, compact, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Thus far, I really like these headphones. Time will tell, as I also liked my Bose over-ear headphones until the padding and foam deteriorated over time. I expect that the longer warranty V-Moda provides will speak to their durability. The packaging is very Apple-esque and simple. The look and feel is very high-tech and durable. The sound is excellent. For an over-ear headphone they are more comfortable than I expected. My only gripe is that I have been unable to register them. The QR code and online processes are broken. Its like the warranty folks went on vacation and forgot to hire a temp. So, for now they are unwarranted.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small. Ok comfort on th ears. Good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jenilee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended if you can deal with the cable
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Extremely comfortable. Best quality ever. Unfortunately, the cable is a pain. It's noisy when touches your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Carvajal

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I have small ears so these are ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have small ears so these are perfect and lightweight. They are not true noise canceling for airplane use; but they are better than other brands. Great sound and can be worn for extended period without causing me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Really good.
customer_reviews.text: That's probably the most durable and portable on-ear headphone that i could find. The only problem that I find is when I use it for a long period of time my ear stars to hurt and tha's the only reason I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: After using low quality junk forever I could not believe the difference these headphones made. There are really no words to adequately describe the sound difference. You can hear the small nuances in songs that just cannot be heard in low quality headphones. I would definitely recommend the V-Moda's to anyone who takes music listening serious.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Sound is fantastic and bright
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fantastic and bright, good mids and clean bass. Really small, not for big ears. Fantastic build quality and highly portable. If you can get used to the over the ear fitment and ears don't get bothered, I highly suggest you pic this up!!! Another great VModa product.
customer_reviews.author: Bam3vO

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great, Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm not audiophile, but I love the sound from the headphones (listening to Tool, Metallica, Chili Peppers, etc). Everything sounds clear, and no over-powering bass like you would get from Beats. The one quirk I've noticed is that for some reason the left side feels more snug than the right side when on my head, but that could just be my head shape. Overall, I think the build quality is fantastic and I love the hard-shell case they come with.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: ... the sound quality and the fit and feel are great. The only strange thing about them is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the sound quality and the fit and feel are great. The only strange thing about them is that their volume button doesn't control the volume, only pauses and plays the music. At least on Apple products. Otherwise, it's a rad headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty flat but with a little snap to the base
customer_reviews.author: patriot1

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I own several headphones and these are perhaps the best i've tried in regards to sound quality. Construction is sturdy and they fold up into a small case for travel. Definitely worth the cost. If there's one gripe, albeit minor, I had with the purchase it was that it didn't come with an full functional apple cable (the included cable does not allow for volume adjustment); though the company did indicate to me that one was being being developed as an accessory.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and Design
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, a lot better that the bose A2Ew. and very nice design. very durable and small package. The only issue is if you are using this for airplane, because the sound isolation is not that good.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Coello

customer_reviews.title: A Jewel of a Headphone
customer_reviews.text: I have the XS Model in flat black. I added a Shield Kit that has my College Football Number. For me, they are my grab and go headphones because they have great sound, looks, comfort, materials and a great build quality. What more can a music lover ask for? These small on-the-ear headphones are winners in my book.﻿
customer_reviews.author: Dale's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: My BF loves V-Moda headphones. Noise cancellation is a must when he is listening to music as he works out so this headphones work great!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P.

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit and sound when it works
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and sound when it works. But it doesn't work consistently. The sound in the right (non-plug side) comes in and out. It is very touchy. I've pushed it in securely a number of times and doesn't fix the problem. I'm sending back for a replacement so hopefully I just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: popperstop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and sound very well, but it is not for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very poor isolation ruined the sound for me. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jac11

customer_reviews.title: Not for travelling!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great.....iiiif.....you don't want to travel around in them. Sit in a nice quiet room and the sound is pretty special. Sit on a noisy (or not so noisy) train and the leakage of ambient train and passenger sounds is so unbearable that you might feel inclined to switch your music off completely. I found the disruption to my music unacceptable. Its a big shame, but they just had to be returned. This product is simply not as described. (As a side issue, my headphones were dispatched without a cable and the '6 star' service (big words, V-Moda) sent me an incorrect replacement and then ignored my subsequent emails completely. Not nice.)
customer_reviews.author: BettyB

customer_reviews.title: ... headphones are your type then this headphone may be perfect for you
customer_reviews.text: if on-ear headphones are your type then this headphone may be perfect for you :P
customer_reviews.author: Abhirav Kushwaha

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. I did a lot of research to determine the best headphones, and V-MODA was highly rated. I go on walks a couple of times a day and the Bose earbuds were not giving me the full sound of the music and vocals. These V-MODA are very well made and designed. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones - with 2 little annoying things.......
customer_reviews.text: I compared these to Sony MDR-10RBT and B&W P3 and these were the winner. Great sound. Good build quality. Comfortable. I would definitely recommend aside from a few small things... The case is ugly. It looks like something from Aliens or a sci-fi movie. Yes - it is durable, but just ugly. One more slight annoyance is the orange cord, and how the small cords stick out at the ear level, but I can get over this easily knowing the cables are of good quality. But - these things are OK and I will get used to them. I'm just overall happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: jabdigital

customer_reviews.title: best of all
customer_reviews.text: soo this headphones..... are......beast i am a dj/producer sooo.... the bass is punching everything is crisp the quality its beast best on ear headphones if u are a dubstep and electro house glitch hop punk or moombah this are your headphone
customer_reviews.author: Lilliam Brens

customer_reviews.title: Well built but otherwise too small to be useful
customer_reviews.text: They sound okay but the cups are so so small. It's difficult to get them to fit comfortably or to get a good sound seal. If what you really need are portable headphones, just get ear buds. They are very sturdily built, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kadsl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as clear as I had hoped. Bass is kind of a one tone deal. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Build & Audio. However The Comfort Level Needs Work.
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is definitely much better than most headphones I have ever used. The construction of these headphones seems to be of high quality, and the materials used make it very durable. However it fits rather tight and presses down on my ears too much. This makes wearing them for extended periods a bit painful. Also the whole ad campaign about mind the gap seems flawed, as I still see a lot of space between the headphone bands and my head. More than I see with some other headphones I have. If they could work on the comfort level so it doesn't squeeze down on my ears so much they might have a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Well Built, Poor sound for the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: The good: these phones are well made, comfortable, and look fantastic. The best part of these phones are the mids, which sound phenomenal. The mid-bass is also good. The bad: the sub-bass is barely there, practically nonexistent. The highs are have no sibilance, but are subdued and shrouded. These are definitely not audiophile headphones, more for trendy yuppies and teens who want to show off a fashion statement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound quality. The fit on the ear is ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing sound quality. The fit on the ear is not snug enough to allow for deep bass reproduction, even after adjusting the band.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando M. Socol

customer_reviews.title: It's a good for audio and gaming but if you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good for audio and gaming but if you need to know from which direction sound is coming from, then you should get a 7.1 channel headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Blitzy

customer_reviews.title: Tight on the head.
customer_reviews.text: These are super tight on the ears. They do block noise, but I couldn't wear them for longer than an hour. They have a cool design though and fit in a small case, so I'll give them two stars.
customer_reviews.author: d volweiler

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable to hang on the back of the neck
customer_reviews.text: Sound is awesome as many before me already stated that nicely. However, there are two main drawbacks: 1. The 3.5mm cable end doesn't fit my phone (HTC One M8), it's a bit loose. The "six star service" asked my to cut the cord and take a picture of it, for them to send me a new one. What are they thinking? It's a puny cable :/ 2. The headphones are virtually impossible to hang on the back of the neck. It's too tight on the neck. That's a dealbreaker for me. Too bad I got it as a present and can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Avi FB

customer_reviews.title: and had read they were super compatible with Ipods
customer_reviews.text: While I had read the many glowing reviews that broadcast these cans as "Modern Audiophile"...and had read they were super compatible with Ipods.....Other than the output I get sitting absolutely still in a quiet room....These guys lose points for a very quaint performance on the-go...Especially disappointing due to their favor in the On-Ear category.....I should also note that even V-Moda build quality is excellent....at least for my head....these make you feel a bit uneasy when moving your head from side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

product_meta.title: V-MODA XS On-Ear Metal Noise-Isolating Headphones - Matte Black, One Size
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Matte BlackXS combines V-MODA's #1 trusted M-Class modern audiophile sound signature with improved ergonomics and fit. A true timeless masterpiece constructed from exotic materials and tested to the strictest V-MODA durability standards. Numerous innovations include a unique collapsible CLIQFOLD design that allows for compact storage. The XS comes with a specially tuned SpeakEasy cable with mic for universal compatibility and communication. A newly designed compact exoskeleton hard case is the smallest in the modern day road warrior added protection and convenience. Strut in stealth-mode, match your outfit or stand out from the crowd with custom colour shields. "The portable on-ear portable headphone to beat" -Macworld.

BOX CONTAINS
XS headphones
XS Exoskeleton hard carry case
Carabiner
Kevlar reinforced SpeakEasy Microphone control cable
V-CORK (2)
V-MODA Six Star Service
V-MODA Sticker
feature_bullets: Award-winning sound and ultimate ergonomics in an ultra-portable size. Connectivity Technology: Wired
Unique collapsible CliqFold design for compact storage
Supreme comfort, natural noise isolation, bespoke fit and 3D sound with over 3 years of fitting R&D
Ultra compact exoskeleton hard carry case and detachable cable with 1-button microphone
